root.name: Cyberpunk 2077
root.description: OverviewConcept ArtCyberpunk 2077 was announced on May 30th, 2012 during CD Projekt's Summer Conference livestream. It is currently being developed by veterans of The Witcher and The Witcher 2 teams at CD Projekt RED. The game is based on Mike Pondsmith's pen paper RPG "Cyberpunk". Players will be able to create and customize their own characters, there will be different classes and the game will be non-linear and is not intended for everybody as it supposedly features "mature content" as well as "advanced RPG mechanics".
